WRITING.TEXT:
My sister does this and when I'm with her, it makes me cringe.
But, every once in a while if there's enough room, someone will squeeze in as close to her car on purpose and I can't help but to be like "well sis it's cause you're a dick."
I would consider it but being in a place where I am still an adult child myself, I can't fully give an opinion for at least another...5 years.

It is terrible and completely horrifying. I made the mistake of seeing if my cat would get better, knowing he had a brain tumor and that was completely my fault and I did it based on selfish reasoning. But, to end his suffering I had to choose putting him to sleep. The doctor let me sit in while they did it and I saw him shut his eyes and that was it. I started BAWLING and didn't stop even after getting home.
The only way I coped with it was realizing that the suffering was finally over and that my cat was finally in a better place with no more pain. And I also learned to never put my own wants and needs over what is best for a pet ever again.
YES! I don't get the appeal either lol
I am just waiting to see someone say youtubers or even the magcon boys.
Doing the harmonies myself and getting them right in the car was the reason WHY I was late to social functions many times.

"And this guy who was on the phone, turns around and tips his hat like this. And who do you think that guy was? Emilio Estevez.
And I was like EMILIOOOOOO"
